snippet: A former Long Island stockbroker was sentenced Friday to nearly three years in prison for defrauding the backers of a planned Broadway musical.
abstract: Former Long Island stockbroker Mark C Hotton is sentenced to nearly three years in prison for defrauding backers of planned Broadway musical Rebecca; Hotton had pretended to know investors that could rescue the financially struggling show.
lead_paragraph: A former Long Island stockbroker was sentenced Friday to nearly three years in prison for defrauding the backers of a planned Broadway musical.

headline.main: Man Sentenced to Nearly Three Years for Defrauding ‘Rebecca’ Producers
